methods.name: createNftCollection
methods.summary: Create a new NFT collection program

methods.name: createNftDrop
methods.summary: Create a new NFT drop program

methods.name: createToken
methods.summary: Create a new token program

methods.name: balance
methods.summary: Get the NFT balance of the connected wallet

examples.javascript: const balance = await program.balance();

methods.name: balanceOf
methods.summary: Get the NFT balance of the specified wallet

methods.name: get
methods.summary: Get the metadata for a specific NFT

examples.javascript:
const mintAddress = "...";
const nft = await program.get(mintAddress);

methods.name: getAll
methods.summary: Get the metadata for all NFTs on this collection

examples.javascript: const nfts = await program.getAll();

methods.name: getAllNFTAddresses
methods.summary: Get the mint addresses for all NFTs on this collection

examples.javascript: const nfts = await program.getAllNFTAddresses();

methods.name: getMetadata
methods.summary: Get the metadata for this program.

examples.javascript:
const metadata = await program.getMetadata();
console.log(metadata.name);

methods.name: mint
methods.summary: Mint NFTs to the connected wallet

methods.name: mintAdditionalSupply
methods.summary: Mint additional supply of an NFT to the connected wallet

examples.javascript:
const mintAddress = "..."
const address = await program.mintAdditionalSupply(mintAddress);

methods.name: mintAdditionalSupplyTo
methods.summary: Mint additional supply of an NFT to the specified wallet

methods.name: mintTo
methods.summary: Mint an NFT to the specified wallet

methods.name: supplyOf
methods.summary: Get the supply of NFT editions minted from a specific NFT

examples.javascript:
const address = "...";
const supply = await program.supplyOf(addres);

methods.name: transfer
methods.summary: Transfer the specified NFTs to another wallet

NFTDrop.name: NFTDrop
NFTDrop.summary: A collection of NFTs that can be lazy minted and claimed

methods.name: balance
methods.summary: Get the NFT balance of the connected wallet

examples.javascript: const balance = await program.balance();

methods.name: balanceOf
methods.summary: Get the NFT balance of the specified wallet

methods.name: claim
methods.summary: Claim an NFT from the drop with connected wallet

examples.javascript:
const claimedAddresses = await program.claim(1);
console.log("Claimed NFT at address", claimedAddresses[0]);

methods.name: claimTo
methods.summary: Claim an NFT from the drop for the specified wallet

methods.name: get
methods.summary: Get the metadata for a specific NFT

examples.javascript:
const mintAddress = "...";
const nft = await program.get(mintAddress);

methods.name: getAll
methods.summary: Get the metadata for all NFTs on this drop

examples.javascript: const nfts = await program.getAll();

methods.name: getAllClaimed
methods.summary: Get the metadata for all the claimed NFTs on this drop

examples.javascript: const nfts = await program.getAllClaimed();

methods.name: getMetadata
methods.summary: Get the metadata for this program.

examples.javascript:
const metadata = await program.getMetadata();
console.log(metadata.name);

methods.name: lazyMint
methods.summary: Lazy mint NFTs to be claimed later

methods.name: totalClaimedSupply
methods.summary: Get the total claimed supply of this drop

examples.javascript: const supply = await program.totalClaimedSupply();

methods.name: totalUnclaimedSupply
methods.summary: Get the total unclaimed supply of this drop

examples.javascript: const supply = await program.totalUnclaimedSupply();

methods.name: transfer
methods.summary: Transfer the specified NFTs to another wallet

Program.name: Program
Program.summary: Dynamic interface for interacting with Solana programs.

methods.name: call
methods.summary: Call a function on this program

ThirdwebSDK.name: ThirdwebSDK
ThirdwebSDK.summary: The main entry-point for the thirdweb Solana SDK.

methods.name: balance
methods.summary: Get the token balance of the connected wallet

examples.javascript:
const balance = await program.balance();
console.log(balance.displayValue);

methods.name: balanceOf
methods.summary: Get the token balance of the specified wallet

methods.name: getMetadata
methods.summary: Get the metadata for this token including the name, supply, and decimals.

methods.name: mint
methods.summary: Mints the specified amount of new tokens to the connected wallet

examples.javascript: const tx = await program.mint(1);

methods.name: mintTo
methods.summary: Mints the specified amount of new tokens to a specific wallet

examples.javascript:
const address = "{{wallet_address}}"";
const tx = await program.mintTo(address, 1);

methods.name: totalSupply
methods.summary: Get the total minted supply of this token

examples.javascript: const supply = await program.totalSupply();

methods.name: transfer
methods.summary: Transfer the specified amount of tokens to another wallet

UserWallet.name: UserWallet
UserWallet.summary: Handle and view info about the wallet connected to the SDK.

methods.name: connect
methods.summary: Connect a signer to the SDK. Can pass in a keypair or browser wallet adapter

examples.javascript:
const signer = Keypair.generate();
sdk.wallet.connect(signer);

methods.name: disconnect
methods.summary: Disconnect the connect wallet from the SDK

examples.javascript: sdk.wallet.disconnect();

methods.name: getAddress
methods.summary: Get the address of the connected wallet

examples.javascript: const address = sdk.wallet.getAddress()

methods.name: getBalance
methods.summary: Get the native balance of the connected wallet

examples.javascript:
const balance = await sdk.wallet.getBalance();
console.log(balance.displayValue);

methods.name: getSigner
methods.summary: Get the connected signer

examples.javascript: const signer = sdk.wallet.getSigner()
